metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12958 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Xpdf 4.01.01, a heap-based buffer over-read could be triggered in FoFiType1C::convertToType0 in fofi/FoFiType1C.cc when it is trying to access the second privateDicts array element, because the privateDicts array has only one element allocated.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> looks like CVE-2017-14976 in poppler ebarretto> since 0.5.12-1 libextractor does not use xpdf anymore. xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
